mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(road_id) FROM t_road WHERE road_name LIKE CONCAT(#{rssName}, '%') AND `status` =#{type}
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_road tr SET tr.`status` = 0 WHERE road_id =#{rssId}
mapper.select: SELECT tc.camera_code, tr.road_name, CONCAT(ts.lng, '|',ts.lat) AS coordinate FROM t_camera tc LEFT JOIN t_road_seg sr ON tc.site_id = sr.src_site_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON ts.site_id = sr.src_site_id LEFT JOIN t_road tr ON sr.road_id = tr.road_id WHERE tr.road_name IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT tc.camera_code, tr.road_name, CONCAT(ts.lng, '|',ts.lat) AS coordinate FROM t_camera tc LEFT JOIN t_road_seg sr ON tc.site_id = sr.dst_site_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON ts.site_id = sr.dst_site_id LEFT JOIN t_road tr ON sr.road_id = tr.road_id WHERE tr.road_name IS NOT NULL
